Apple Music Matches Files with Metadata Only, not Acoustic Fingerprinting

Kirk McElhearn:

This is a very big problem with Apple Music. Since Apple already has the technology to match tracks using acoustic fingerprinting, they should be using this with Apple Music. Instead, itâ€™s using scattershot matching, which results in lots of tracks showing up as being from different albums, from compilations, or totally different versions of songs.

The sad story of Apple Music seems continue with the big problem of matching music method they use.
